genresAdvancedInfo.name: rap potiguar
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Rap potiguar is a style of hip hop that originated in the Brazilian state of Rio Grande do Norte. It's characterized by its use of local rhythms and beats, as well as its focus on social issues like poverty, inequality, and police brutality. The lyrics are often political and confrontational, calling out corruption and injustice in Brazilian society.
